name: @microsoft/fast-cli-project
description: A project for FAST command line tools.

scripts.check: beachball check --changehint "Run 'npm run change' to generate a change file"
scripts.test:diff:error: echo "Untracked files exist, try running npm prepare to identify the culprit." && exit 1
scripts.test:diff: git update-index --refresh && git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || npm run test:diff:error
scripts.test: npm run prettier --workspaces --if-present && npm run test:diff && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
